GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
igc: avoid kernel warning when changing RX ring parameters

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit ab8c107470d12e7ef99030bf0911a10cdef62d16, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 73f1071c1d2952b8c93cd6cd99744768c59ec840. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: igc: avoid kernel warning when changing RX ring parameters
